tags.name: salesOrderRepositoryV1
tags.description: Order repository interface. An order is a document that a web store issues to a customer. Magento generates a sales order that lists the product items, billing and shipping addresses, and shipping and payment methods. A corresponding external document, known as a purchase order, is emailed to the customer.

tags.name: salesOrderManagementV1
tags.description: Order management interface. An order is a document that a web store issues to a customer. Magento generates a sales order that lists the product items, billing and shipping addresses, and shipping and payment methods. A corresponding external document, known as a purchase order, is emailed to the customer.

tags.name: salesOrderAddressRepositoryV1
tags.description: Order address repository interface. An order is a document that a web store issues to a customer. Magento generates a sales order that lists the product items, billing and shipping addresses, and shipping and payment methods. A corresponding external document, known as a purchase order, is emailed to the customer.

tags.name: salesOrderItemRepositoryV1
tags.description: Order item repository interface. An order is a document that a web store issues to a customer. Magento generates a sales order that lists the product items, billing and shipping addresses, and shipping and payment methods. A corresponding external document, known as a purchase order, is emailed to the customer.

tags.name: salesInvoiceRepositoryV1
tags.description: Invoice repository interface. An invoice is a record of the receipt of payment for an order.

tags.name: salesInvoiceManagementV1
tags.description: Invoice management interface. An invoice is a record of the receipt of payment for an order.

tags.name: salesInvoiceCommentRepositoryV1
tags.description: Invoice comment repository interface. An invoice is a record of the receipt of payment for an order. An invoice can include comments that detail the invoice history.

tags.name: salesCreditmemoManagementV1
tags.description: Credit memo add comment interface. After a customer places and pays for an order and an invoice has been issued, the merchant can create a credit memo to refund all or part of the amount paid for any returned or undelivered items. The memo restores funds to the customer account so that the customer can make future purchases.

tags.name: salesCreditmemoRepositoryV1
tags.description: Credit memo repository interface. After a customer places and pays for an order and an invoice has been issued, the merchant can create a credit memo to refund all or part of the amount paid for any returned or undelivered items. The memo restores funds to the customer account so that the customer can make future purchases.

tags.name: salesCreditmemoCommentRepositoryV1
tags.description: Credit memo comment repository interface. After a customer places and pays for an order and an invoice has been issued, the merchant can create a credit memo to refund all or part of the amount paid for any returned or undelivered items. The memo restores funds to the customer account so that the customer can make future purchases. A credit memo usually includes comments that detail why the credit memo amount was credited to the customer.

tags.name: salesShipmentRepositoryV1
tags.description: Shipment repository interface. A shipment is a delivery package that contains products. A shipment document accompanies the shipment. This document lists the products and their quantities in the delivery package.

tags.name: salesShipmentManagementV1
tags.description: Shipment management interface. A shipment is a delivery package that contains products. A shipment document accompanies the shipment. This document lists the products and their quantities in the delivery package.

tags.name: salesShipmentCommentRepositoryV1
tags.description: Shipment comment repository interface. A shipment is a delivery package that contains products. A shipment document accompanies the shipment. This document lists the products and their quantities in the delivery package. A shipment document can contain comments.

tags.name: salesShipmentTrackRepositoryV1
tags.description: Shipment track repository interface. A shipment is a delivery package that contains products. A shipment document accompanies the shipment. This document lists the products and their quantities in the delivery package.

tags.name: salesTransactionRepositoryV1
tags.description: Transaction repository interface. A transaction is an interaction between a merchant and a customer such as a purchase, a credit, a refund, and so on.

baseMediaUrl.description: Base media URL for the store

secureBaseUrl.description: Secure base URL for the store

secureBaseLinkUrl.description: Secure base link URL for the store

secureBaseStaticUrl.description: Secure base static URL for the store

baseCurrencyCode.description: The base currency code for the store.

baseCurrencySymbol.description: The currency symbol of the base currency for the store.

defaultDisplayCurrencyCode.description: The default display currency code for the store.

defaultDisplayCurrencySymbol.description: The currency symbol of the default display currency for the store.

availableCurrencyCodes.description: The list of allowed currency codes for the store.

exchangeRates.description: The list of exchange rate information for the store.

currencyTo.description: The currency code associated with the exchange rate.

rate.description: The exchange rate for the associated currency and the store's base currency.

id.description: The country id for the store.

twoLetterAbbreviation.description: The country 2 letter abbreviation for the store.

threeLetterAbbreviation.description: The country 3 letter abbreviation for the store.

fullNameLocale.description: The country full name (in store locale) for the store.

fullNameEnglish.description: The country full name (in English) for the store.

availableRegions.description: The available regions for the store.

framework-search-filter-group.description: Groups two or more filters together using a logical OR

filters.description: A list of filters in this group

framework-filter.description: Filter which can be used by any methods from service layer.

customer-data-group-search-results-inter.description: Interface for customer groups search results.

multilineCount.description: Of lines of the attribute value.

options.description: Options of the attribute (key => value pairs for select)

frontendClass.description: Class which is used to display the attribute on frontend.

userDefined.description: Current attribute has been defined by a user.

frontendLabel.description: Label which supposed to be displayed on frontend.

note.description: The note attribute for the element.

isUsedInGrid.description: It is used in customer grid

isVisibleInGrid.description: It is visible in customer grid

isFilterableInGrid.description: It is filterable in customer grid

isSearchableInGrid.description: It is searchable in customer grid

defaultShipping.description: If this address is default shipping address.

defaultBilling.description: If this address is default billing address

valid.description: If the provided data is valid.

messages.description: Error messages as array in case of validation failure, else return empty array.

cms-data-page-search-results-interface.description: Interface for cms page search results.

cms-data-block-search-results-interface.description: Interface for cms block search results.

linkUrl.description: Link url or null when type is 'file'

minQty.description: Minimal quantity available for item status in stock

minSaleQty.description: Minimum Qty Allowed in Shopping Cart or NULL when there is no limitation

maxSaleQty.description: Maximum Qty Allowed in Shopping Cart data wrapper

notifyStockQty.description: Notify for Quantity Below data wrapper

gift-card-data-giftcard-amount-interface.description: Interface GiftcardAmountInterface: this interface is used to serialize and deserialize EAV attribute giftcard_amounts

disabled.description: If gallery entry is hidden from product page

types.description: Gallery entry image types (thumbnail, image, small_image etc)

isHtmlAllowedOnFront.description: The HTML tags are allowed on the frontend

usedForSortBy.description: It is used for sorting in product listing

isFilterableInSearch.description: It is used in search results layered navigation

isUsedInGrid.description: It is used in catalog product grid

isVisibleInGrid.description: It is visible in catalog product grid

isFilterableInGrid.description: It is filterable in catalog product grid

applyTo.description: Apply to value for the element

isSearchable.description: The attribute can be used in Quick Search

isVisibleInAdvancedSearch.description: The attribute can be used in Advanced Search

isComparable.description: The attribute can be compared on the frontend

isUsedForPromoRules.description: The attribute can be used for promo rules

isVisibleOnFront.description: The attribute is visible on the frontend

usedInProductListing.description: The attribute can be used in product listing

options.description: Options of the attribute (key => value pairs for select)

isUserDefined.description: Current attribute has been defined by a user.

note.description: The note attribute for the element.

isHtmlAllowedOnFront.description: The HTML tags are allowed on the frontend

usedForSortBy.description: It is used for sorting in product listing

isFilterableInSearch.description: It is used in search results layered navigation

isUsedInGrid.description: It is used in catalog product grid

isVisibleInGrid.description: It is visible in catalog product grid

isFilterableInGrid.description: It is filterable in catalog product grid

applyTo.description: Apply to value for the element

isSearchable.description: The attribute can be used in Quick Search

isVisibleInAdvancedSearch.description: The attribute can be used in Advanced Search

isComparable.description: The attribute can be compared on the frontend

isUsedForPromoRules.description: The attribute can be used for promo rules

isVisibleOnFront.description: The attribute is visible on the frontend

usedInProductListing.description: The attribute can be used in product listing

options.description: Options of the attribute (key => value pairs for select)

isUserDefined.description: Current attribute has been defined by a user.

note.description: The note attribute for the element.

createdAt.description: Cart creation date and time. Otherwise, null.

updatedAt.description: Cart last update date and time. Otherwise, null.

convertedAt.description: Cart conversion date and time. Otherwise, null.

isActive.description: Active status flag value. Otherwise, null.

itemsCount.description: Number of different items or products in the cart. Otherwise, null.

itemsQty.description: Total quantity of all cart items. Otherwise, null.

customerIsGuest.description: For guest customers, false for logged in customers

storeToBaseRate.description: Store currency to base currency rate

storeToQuoteRate.description: Store currency to quote currency rate

baseToGlobalRate.description: Base currency to global currency rate

baseToQuoteRate.description: Base currency to quote currency rate

available.description: The value of the availability flag for the current shipping method.

subtotalWithDiscount.description: Subtotal in quote currency with applied discount

baseSubtotalWithDiscount.description: Subtotal in base currency with applied discount

shippingDiscountAmount.description: Shipping discount amount in quote currency

baseShippingDiscountAmount.description: Shipping discount amount in base currency

weeeTaxAppliedAmount.description: Item weee tax applied amount in quote currency.

shippingTaxAmount.description: Shipping tax amount in quote currency

baseShippingTaxAmount.description: Shipping tax amount in base currency

subtotalInclTax.description: Subtotal including tax in quote currency

baseSubtotalInclTax.description: Subtotal including tax in base currency

shippingInclTax.description: Shipping including tax in quote currency

baseShippingInclTax.description: Shipping including tax in base currency

rowTotalWithDiscount.description: Row total with discount in quote currency. Otherwise, null.

taxAmount.description: Tax amount in quote currency. Otherwise, null.

baseTaxAmount.description: Tax amount in base currency. Otherwise, null.

discountAmount.description: Discount amount in quote currency. Otherwise, null.

baseDiscountAmount.description: Discount amount in base currency. Otherwise, null.

priceInclTax.description: Price including tax in quote currency. Otherwise, null.

basePriceInclTax.description: Price including tax in base currency. Otherwise, null.

rowTotalInclTax.description: Row total including tax in quote currency. Otherwise, null.

baseRowTotalInclTax.description: Row total including tax in base currency. Otherwise, null.

weeeTaxAppliedAmount.description: Item weee tax applied amount in quote currency.

weeeTaxApplied.description: Item weee tax applied in quote currency.

sales-data-order-interface.description: Order interface. An order is a document that a web store issues to a customer. Magento generates a sales order that lists the product items, billing and shipping addresses, and shipping and payment methods. A corresponding external document, known as a purchase order, is emailed to the customer.

baseShippingDiscountTaxCompensationAmnt.description: Base shipping discount tax compensation amount.

sales-data-order-item-interface.description: Order item interface. An order is a document that a web store issues to a customer. Magento generates a sales order that lists the product items, billing and shipping addresses, and shipping and payment methods. A corresponding external document, known as a purchase order, is emailed to the customer.

baseWeeeTaxAppliedRowAmnt.description: Base WEEE tax applied row amount.

sales-data-order-address-interface.description: Order address interface. An order is a document that a web store issues to a customer. Magento generates a sales order that lists the product items, billing and shipping addresses, and shipping and payment methods. A corresponding external document, known as a purchase order, is emailed to the customer.

street.description: Array of any street values. Otherwise, null.

sales-data-order-payment-interface.description: Order payment interface. An order is a document that a web store issues to a customer. Magento generates a sales order that lists the product items, billing and shipping addresses, and shipping and payment methods. A corresponding external document, known as a purchase order, is emailed to the customer.

ccLast4.description: Last four digits of the credit card.

sales-data-order-status-history-interfac.description: Order status history interface. An order is a document that a web store issues to a customer. Magento generates a sales order that lists the product items, billing and shipping addresses, and shipping and payment methods. A corresponding external document, known as a purchase order, is emailed to the customer.

baseShippingDiscountTaxCompensationAmnt.description: Base shipping discount tax compensation amount.

type.description: Type (shipping, product, weee, gift wrapping, etc)

itemId.description: Item id if this item is a product

associatedItemId.description: Associated item id if this item is associated with another item, null otherwise

sales-data-order-search-result-interface.description: Order search result interface. An order is a document that a web store issues to a customer. Magento generates a sales order that lists the product items, billing and shipping addresses, and shipping and payment methods. A corresponding external document, known as a purchase order, is emailed to the customer.

sales-data-order-status-history-search-r.description: Order status history search result interface. An order is a document that a web store issues to a customer. Magento generates a sales order that lists the product items, billing and shipping addresses, and shipping and payment methods. A corresponding external document, known as a purchase order, is emailed to the customer.

sales-data-order-item-search-result-inte.description: Order item search result interface. An order is a document that a web store issues to a customer. Magento generates a sales order that lists the product items, billing and shipping addresses, and shipping and payment methods. A corresponding external document, known as a purchase order, is emailed to the customer.

sales-data-invoice-interface.description: Invoice interface. An invoice is a record of the receipt of payment for an order.

baseShippingDiscountTaxCompensationAmnt.description: Base shipping discount tax compensation amount.

comments.description: Array of any invoice comments. Otherwise, null.

sales-data-invoice-item-interface.description: Invoice item interface. An invoice is a record of the receipt of payment for an order. An invoice item is a purchased item in an invoice.

sales-data-invoice-comment-interface.description: Invoice comment interface. An invoice is a record of the receipt of payment for an order. An invoice can include comments that detail the invoice history.

sales-data-invoice-search-result-interfa.description: Invoice search result interface. An invoice is a record of the receipt of payment for an order.

sales-data-invoice-comment-search-result.description: Invoice comment search result interface. An invoice is a record of the receipt of payment for an order. An invoice can include comments that detail the invoice history.

sales-data-creditmemo-comment-search-res.description: Credit memo comment search result interface. After a customer places and pays for an order and an invoice has been issued, the merchant can create a credit memo to refund all or part of the amount paid for any returned or undelivered items. The memo restores funds to the customer account so that the customer can make future purchases. A credit memo usually includes comments that detail why the credit memo amount was credited to the customer.

sales-data-creditmemo-comment-interface.description: Credit memo comment interface. After a customer places and pays for an order and an invoice has been issued, the merchant can create a credit memo to refund all or part of the amount paid for any returned or undelivered items. The memo restores funds to the customer account so that the customer can make future purchases. A credit memo usually includes comments that detail why the credit memo amount was credited to the customer.

sales-data-creditmemo-search-result-inte.description: Credit memo search result interface. After a customer places and pays for an order and an invoice has been issued, the merchant can create a credit memo to refund all or part of the amount paid for any returned or undelivered items. The memo restores funds to the customer account so that the customer can make future purchases.

sales-data-creditmemo-interface.description: Credit memo interface. After a customer places and pays for an order and an invoice has been issued, the merchant can create a credit memo to refund all or part of the amount paid for any returned or undelivered items. The memo restores funds to the customer account so that the customer can make future purchases.

baseDiscountTaxCompensationAmount.description: Credit memo base discount tax compensation amount.

baseShippingDiscountTaxCompensationAmnt.description: Credit memo base shipping discount tax compensation amount.

baseShippingInclTax.description: Credit memo base shipping including tax.

baseShippingTaxAmount.description: Credit memo base shipping tax amount.

baseSubtotalInclTax.description: Credit memo base subtotal including tax.

emailSent.description: Credit memo email sent flag value.

discountTaxCompensationAmount.description: Credit memo discount tax compensation amount.

shippingDiscountTaxCompensationAmount.description: Credit memo shipping discount tax compensation amount.

comments.description: Array of any credit memo comments. Otherwise, null.

sales-data-creditmemo-item-interface.description: Credit memo item interface. After a customer places and pays for an order and an invoice has been issued, the merchant can create a credit memo to refund all or part of the amount paid for any returned or undelivered items. The memo restores funds to the customer account so that the customer can make future purchases. A credit memo item is an invoiced item for which a merchant creates a credit memo.

baseCost.description: The base cost for a credit memo item.

baseDiscountAmount.description: The base discount amount for a credit memo item.

baseDiscountTaxCompensationAmount.description: The base discount tax compensation amount for a credit memo item.

basePrice.description: The base price for a credit memo item.

baseWeeeTaxAppliedRowAmnt.description: Base WEEE tax applied row amount.

sales-data-shipment-interface.description: Shipment interface. A shipment is a delivery package that contains products. A shipment document accompanies the shipment. This document lists the products and their quantities in the delivery package.

packages.description: Array of packages, if any. Otherwise, null.

sales-data-shipment-package-interface.description: Shipment package interface. A shipment is a delivery package that contains products. A shipment document accompanies the shipment. This document lists the products and their quantities in the delivery package.

sales-data-shipment-item-interface.description: Shipment item interface. A shipment is a delivery package that contains products. A shipment document accompanies the shipment. This document lists the products and their quantities in the delivery package. A product is an item in a shipment.

sales-data-shipment-track-interface.description: Shipment track interface. A shipment is a delivery package that contains products. A shipment document accompanies the shipment. This document lists the products and their quantities in the delivery package. Merchants and customers can track shipments.

orderId.description: The order_id for the shipment package.

sales-data-shipment-comment-interface.description: Shipment comment interface. A shipment is a delivery package that contains products. A shipment document accompanies the shipment. This document lists the products and their quantities in the delivery package. A shipment document can contain comments.

sales-data-shipment-search-result-interf.description: Shipment search result interface. A shipment is a delivery package that contains products. A shipment document accompanies the shipment. This document lists the products and their quantities in the delivery package.

sales-data-shipment-comment-search-resul.description: Shipment comment search result interface. A shipment is a delivery package that contains products. A shipment document accompanies the shipment. This document lists the products and their quantities in the delivery package. A shipment document can contain comments.

sales-data-shipment-item-creation-interf.description: Input argument for shipment item creation Interface ShipmentItemCreationInterface

sales-data-shipment-package-creation-int.description: Shipment package interface. A shipment is a delivery package that contains products. A shipment document accompanies the shipment. This document lists the products and their quantities in the delivery package.

sales-data-shipment-creation-arguments-i.description: Interface for creation arguments for Shipment.

sales-data-transaction-interface.description: Transaction interface. A transaction is an interaction between a merchant and a customer such as a purchase, a credit, a refund, and so on.

parentId.description: The parent ID for the transaction. Otherwise, null.

additionalInformation.description: Array of additional information. Otherwise, null.

sales-data-transaction-search-result-int.description: Transaction search result interface. A transaction is an interaction between a merchant and a customer such as a purchase, a credit, a refund, and so on.

sales-data-invoice-item-creation-interfa.description: Input argument for invoice creation Interface InvoiceItemCreationInterface

sales-data-invoice-creation-arguments-in.description: Interface for creation arguments for Invoice.

criteriaList.description: Criteria objects added to current Composite Criteria
Criteria objects added to current Composite Criteria

tax-data-tax-rate-search-results-interfa.description: Interface for tax rate search results.

tax-data-tax-rule-search-results-interfa.description: Interface for tax rule search results.

tax-data-tax-class-search-results-interf.description: Interface for tax class search results.

websiteIds.description: A list of websites the rule applies to

customerGroupIds.description: Ids of customer groups that the rule applies to

fromDate.description: The start date when the coupon is active

toDate.description: The end date when the coupon is active

timesUsed.description: How many times the rule has been used

isRss.description: Whether the rule is in RSS

attributeName.description: The attribute name of the condition

ruleId.description: The id of the rule associated with the coupon

timesUsed.description: The number of times the coupon has been used

isPrimary.description: The coupon is primary coupon for the rule that it's associated with

ruleId.description: The id of the rule associated with the coupon

delimiterAtEvery.description: The spacing where the delimiter should exist

giftCardsAmountUsed.description: Cards amount used in quote currency

baseGiftCardsAmountUsed.description: Cards amount used in base currency
